title: Acupuncture
author: Acupuncture Center
description: The Acupuncture Center of Santa Maria provides you with exceptional professional skills, compassion, and a personal approach to support your health.
cleaned_text: Dr. Kandel's 36+ years of dedication to integrative wellness care ensures The Acupuncture Center of Santa Maria provides you with exceptional professional skills, compassion, and a personal approach to support your health. A systemized approach focusing around the fascia/connective tissue to better integrate and align the body. Massage therapy provides relaxation, useful rehabilitation, and health maintenance. We hope you are staying safe and well in these difficult times. During COVID-19, you can refer to this page for relevant information and updates. Our office policy has the highest standard to reduce the possibility of transmission: [Please Read More Here](/covid-19-prevention-and-symptom-relief) [225 E.
